entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Regina Int'l Airport 11:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

Temperature: -2.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:27 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 30%
